title: Lanthanide promoted nickel catalysts for the integrated capture and conversion of carbon dioxide to methane via metal carbonates
content:

Christopher J. Koch, Zohaib Suhail, Prince, Anushan Alagaratnam, Matthew Coe, Alain Goeppert, G. K. Surya Prakash
An integrated CO2 capture and conversion system utilizing metal hydroxide salts has been developed to capture CO2 from various sources including air in the form of carbonate salts and convert them directly into a synthetic fuel; methane.
